volunteering.title: Code For Nepal Volunteer
volunteering.description: Contributing to open-source projects aimed at increasing digital literacy in rural Nepal. Developing educational resources and conducting coding workshops in underserved communities.

volunteering.title: STEM Mentor
volunteering.description: Mentoring high school students in science and technology projects. Organized monthly coding bootcamps and helped students develop practical technology solutions for local problems.

volunteering.title: Digital Literacy Instructor
volunteering.description: Taught basic computer skills to adults in rural communities. Created simplified learning materials in local languages to help bridge the digital divide.
